alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 31 at 2:24PM MST until January 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected with higher speeds possible over higher terrain. * WHERE...Upper San Pedro River Valley, Eastern Cochise County below 5000 feet, Upper Gila River Valley, Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains and Chiricahua Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
